front.title: A Framework for IPv6 Over ATM

abstract.t: This document describes a framework for adapting IPv6 and its base protocols [IPv6-SPEC, IPV6-ND, IPV6-ADDRCONF, IPV6-ADDRARCH, IPV6-DHCP] to ATM networks while maintaining the complete functionality and semantics of these protocols. This is done by defining an IPv6 `link'' for ATM (and NBMA) networks in a way which preserves all the fundamental IPv6 concepts and functionality while still taking advantage of the unique capabilities of ATM.
